last_episode_to_air.name: Dance Puppy Dance
last_episode_to_air.overview: Apple and Plum ask Cherry to compose music for the video of the dancing dog show so that it can be uploaded to Apple's website. Cherry is very busy writing a song for the queen of Berryvania but takes a break to do as they ask her.

name: Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures
overview: Welcome to Berry Bitty City, a berry special little world under the leaves of a berry patch. It may be small, but Berry Bitty City is big on fun and adventure. It's where Strawberry Shortcake and all her friends live. Together, they prove that little girls can do berry big things. There's always something fun to do, and when someone needs help, her friends are always there to lend a hand.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: A spin-off of the beloved Strawberry Shortcake series, "Berry Bitty Adventures" takes place in the fanciful, colorful community of Berry Bitty City.

tagline: What if there was a miniature world hidden in your very own garden?

episodes.name: Fish Out of Water
episodes.overview: Orange Blossom adopts a fish but soon discovers its actually a tadpole.  It grows into a frog and causes nothing but trouble.

episodes.name: A Stitch in Time
episodes.overview: When Raspberry Torte can't make a decision on how to stitch Strawberry Shortcake's new dress Plum Pudding secretly helps.

episodes.name: The Vanishing Violets
episodes.overview: It's time for the Berry Bitty City Flower Show but Lemon Meringue's prize violets start disappearing.  Is Berrykin Bloom behind it all or is it something else.

episodes.name: Babysitter Blues
episodes.overview: Baby Berrykin's sparkles are causing all kinds of trouble for Princess Berrykin and everyone at the berryworks.  Strawberry and her friends help out by babysitting and teaching him a lesson in manners.

episodes.name: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Lemon Meringue buys a machine to make hair-styling faster and better, but soon feels left out and sad, and worries her job might be over for good.

episodes.name: Pop Goes the Garden
episodes.overview: Blueberry Muffin planted quick grow daisy seeds but they unexpectedly grow into enormous corn stalks. She and the others must decide what to do with the giant ears of corn before somebody gets hurt..

episodes.name: The Berry Best You Can Bee
episodes.overview: When a delivery bee is sick, Strawberry offers to help Postmaster Bumble-Bee deliver a special birthday package to Berry Bitty Dale.

episodes.name: Strawberry's House Pests
episodes.overview: Strawberry lets Jadie Bugs' mischievous spoiled cousins Sadie and Kadie stay with her while their visiting.  Strawberry tries to be the best hostess she can be but things are starting to get out of hand.

episodes.name: Berry Bitty World Record
episodes.overview: Orange Blossom and the gang try to win a holiday trip for Berrykin Bloom.

episodes.name: Too Cool for Rules
episodes.overview: Plum Pudding forgets the rules about using Lemon's boat which causes problems for the Berrykins.  Strawberry tries to tell her that Lemon should be able to set the rules for her boat.  Soon everyone is making up strange rules.

episodes.name: Berry Best Berryfest Princess
episodes.overview: It's springtime in Berry Bitty City which means it's time for the Berryfest!   Princess Berrykin is away so Berry Bitty City must hold it's first election for Berryfest Princess!

episodes.name: Strawberry's Berry Big Parade
episodes.overview: As Berryfest Princess Strawberry is in charge of the parade and she needs help.  Will her friends settle their differences in time to make it a success?

episodes.name: The Berry Best Choice
episodes.overview: Strawberry learns how to be a leader and face obstacles to make sure the BerryFest is a success.

episodes.name: Nothing to Fear But Berries Themselves
episodes.overview: Orange Blossom fears that the Gumper Lump is real and when there's a power cut in Lemon's salon, the girls act silly and thinks it does exist .

episodes.name: Where, Oh Where has Our Blueberry Gone?
episodes.overview: Blueberry starts reading Patty Persimmon mystery novels and forgets about meetings or appointments with her friends.

episodes.name: Manners Meltdown
episodes.overview: Blueberry forgets her manners and when the Berry Derby party where she tells everyone to act politely.

episodes.name: Trading Sizes
episodes.overview: Raspberry finds a way to enlarge Berrykins to the same size as Strawberry and her friends.

episodes.name: Different Waltz for Different Faults
episodes.overview: Plum tries to get her friends and the Berrykins to dance like a rival dance team, to win the Dance-Off trophy.

episodes.name: Happy First Frost
episodes.overview: Blueberry gives a First Frost Day gift that's more what she wants than the recipient.

episodes.name: A Circle of Friends
episodes.overview: Raspberry gets upset when she suspects her friends of copying her lantern design for the Glimmerberry Gathering.

episodes.name: The Glimmerberry Ball
episodes.overview: Plum finds an ideal location for the Glimmerberry Ball, but two chipmunks keep crashing her party.

episodes.name: Nice as Nails
episodes.overview: Lemon's manicure creations initially delight her friends but eventually grows tiresome.

episodes.name: How You Plat the Game
episodes.overview: Orange works out a plan to ensure that the whole community has equal access to Berry Bitty City's public spaces.

episodes.name: Good Citizens Club
episodes.overview: Sadiebug and Kadiebug create a new club.

episodes.name: Team for Two
episodes.overview: Princess Berrykin gets help from her friends to build a day-care center for the Baby Berrykins, but they disagree about how things should be done.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.overview: Pupcake and Custard, unable to convince Strawberry to play with them, chase after a butterfly into a forest while a storm looms overhead. Meanwhile, Strawberry's at Mr. Longface's party wondering where Pupcake and Custard have disappeared to.

episodes.name: The Berry Big Harvest
episodes.overview: Orange Blossom struggles to deal with an overflow of new products at her store.

episodes.name: Room at the Top
episodes.overview: Building begins on Strawberry's new marketplace, and her pals give her lots of suggestions.

episodes.name: Starlight, Star Bright
episodes.overview: Strawberry's favorite singer, Cherry Jam, performs at the Marketplace, and Strawberry and her pals get to know what the real Cherry is like off stage.

episodes.name: Practice Makes Perfect
episodes.overview: Cherry Jam wants to showcase her students in a recital, but Plum gets nervous about performing.

episodes.name: Top Talent
episodes.overview: The girls prepare for a talent show, and Lemon rejects any assistance with her performance.

episodes.name: A Star is Fashioned
episodes.overview: Raspberry considers moving to the big city in order to work with top fashion designers.

episodes.name: No Blueberry is an Island
episodes.overview: Blueberry thinks Strawberry is planning a tropical getaway for her pals, so she shares this news with them and asks them to keep it a secret.

episodes.name: Where the Berry Breeze Blows
episodes.overview: Bad weather ruins the girls' vacation plans, so Orange tries to recreate a resort area at home.

episodes.name: The Berry Best Vacation
episodes.overview: The girls' vacation gets interrupted when a TV reporter stops by to interview Cherry.

episodes.name: On the Road
episodes.overview: The girls train the Berrykins to run their businesses while they head out of town on a concert tour.

episodes.name: The Berry Long Winter
episodes.overview: Warm weather arrives early in Berry Bitty City, but then the temperatures drop and the townsfolk consider sharing their winter food supplies.

episodes.name: The Big Freeze
episodes.overview: Blueberry creates new skates powered by parasols, and then makes a musical commercial showcasing them.

episodes.name: On Ice
episodes.overview: Strawberry's pals plan events at the same location, so Strawberry suggests they merge their events.

episodes.name: A Boy and His Dogs
episodes.overview: In the third-season opener, Strawberry and her pals befriend Huckleberry Pie after they assist him with some stray dogs.

episodes.name: Partners in Crime
episodes.overview: Blueberry and Huckleberry become writing partners, but she rejects all of his story ideas, so he teams up with Cherry Jam to write a song.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Disappearing Dog Show
episodes.overview: Strawberry hosts a dog show to raise money for Huckleberry's pet shelter, and Plum tries to make the performances extra special.

episodes.name: Snowberry and The Seven Berrykins
episodes.overview: Plum directs a play based on a fairy tale to entertain the Baby Berrykins, but her over-the-top production descends into chaos.

episodes.name: Berryella and Prince Charming
episodes.overview: The girls convince Huck to portray a prince in their play, despite his stage fright and lack of performance skills.

episodes.name: The Littlest Berrykin
episodes.overview: The girls envision themselves as princesses searching for a fabled berry in the play Blueberry and Huckleberry are narrating.

episodes.name: The Berry Big Relay Race
episodes.overview: The juice system that provides electricity to the town breaks down, so a group of Berrykins work on repairing it while the girls keep busy by holding a relay race.

episodes.name: The Berry Best Treasure
episodes.overview: The girls embark on a treasure hunt and wind up looking for missing puppies.

episodes.name: The Berry Scary Fun Adventure
episodes.overview: The girls go camping and suspect a creature is in the woods, so they try to trap it.

episodes.name: The Berry Lucky Day
episodes.overview: Huck finds a good-luck charm and achieves success before he finds out the charm is Cherry's. Strawberry then helps both Huck and Cherry uncover the true origins of their luck.

episodes.name: All Dogs Allowed
episodes.overview: A new dog park is built in town, but something mysterious is scaring the puppies away from it, so the girls must figure out what it is before they hold a tea-party celebration in honor of the new park.

episodes.name: A Basket of Blue Berries
episodes.overview: After Blueberry invites Huck to the Masquerade Ball, she becomes ill and stays home sick. Raspberry and Lemon try to help by secretly pretending to be Blueberry, but things only get confusing, especially when the real Blueberry arrives.

episodes.name: The Berry, Biggest, Berry Baddest Bakeoff
episodes.overview: The girls decide to each bake Berrykin Bloom the perfect cupcake but things spiral out of control when they compete with each other to create the biggest and best cupcake ever!

episodes.name: Berry Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Raspberry and Lemon want to join a fashion contest. They offer Strawberry to be their model, but she is too busy running both her café and the market. Raspberry and Lemon meet the twins Sweet and Sour Grapes, whose names fit their personalities and offer them to replace Strawberry in the café.

episodes.name: Berry Bitty Adventurer
episodes.overview: Apple Dumplin' comes to visit her cousin Strawberry. Soon she causes trouble: she installs a light/music display in Strawberry's bedroom, but cannot turn it off; later she causes a power failure. After Apple leaves, it is revealed that she fixed the power.

episodes.name: High Tech Drama
episodes.overview: Lemon and Raspberry make the final preparations for the contest. Strawberry offers the twins to be models at the contest instead of her. Sweet is delighted, but Sour is not excited. Shortly before the show is broadcast, Sour sabotages the TV equipment.

episodes.name: A Berry Merry Birthday
episodes.overview: The twins' birthday is approaching. Sour says she does not wish to share the birthday with Sweet. Sweet is sad that her sister feels that way but respects her wish. Sour initially enjoys having a birthday of her own and the activities the Berry girls plan for her, but gradually feels lonely without her sister, and regrets what she said earlier.

episodes.name: Tall Tale Trio
episodes.overview: The Berry girls go on their annual camp-out. Cherry, Plum and Orange become tired on the way to the camping site and stop to rest. When they catch up with the other girls, each of them has a different version of the adventure they had.

episodes.name: Berry Big Tale-Teller
episodes.overview: Sour implores Sweet to help her recount the Adventures they had in the Berry Deep Dark Forest, but her performance is so embellished that Sweet can't keep up.

episodes.name: The Berry Bitty Great Race
episodes.overview: At the camping site, Apple tells a story about the great race she participated and won, although the other competitors cheated and did their best to stop her by using dirty tricks.

episodes.name: The Berry Best Taste Test
episodes.overview: Apple's rave review of Strawberry's dessert encourages the Queen of Berryvania to order her new cake for her ball.

episodes.name: The Berry Best Biscuit
episodes.overview: Sour and Apple begin a prank war and they are sentenced in a Berry Bitty City-style trial to camp alone together for a whole weekend.

episodes.name: Hot Sauce Cook Off
episodes.overview: Berrykin Bloom's braggart cousin, Berrykin Bertram, has won the hot sauce competition at the local county fair year after year, but this year, Sour and Apple are determined to help the kindhearted Bloom win.

episodes.name: The Berry Bitty Dance Disaster
episodes.overview: Apple joins Plum's ballet class. When she realizes she is not as good as the others, she decides to make a pair of dancing shoes which she calls "Groove Booties". But they escape and wreak havoc in the town. Apple must find a way to stop the Booties before they ruin the Berryball game.

episodes.name: Doggie Dance No-Show
episodes.overview: Apple makes improved Groove Booties that can teach anyone to dance, including the puppies Pupcake and Pitterpatch. This gives Plum the idea to put on a show of dancing dogs. She asks Huckleberry if Tom Tom would like to participate, and he agrees.

episodes.name: Dance Puppy Dance
episodes.overview: Apple and Plum ask Cherry to compose music for the video of the dancing dog show so that it can be uploaded to Apple's website. Cherry is very busy writing a song for the queen of Berryvania but takes a break to do as they ask her.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: A spin-off of the beloved Strawberry Shortcake series, "Berry Bitty Adventures" takes place in the fanciful, colorful community of Berry Bitty City.
